label: Cleaning Services
description: Professional cleaning services for homes and businesses.
intents: Find a professional cleaner for my home or business.
Get my oven, carpets, or windows cleaned.
Find a cleaning company for end of tenancy cleaning.
Find a local cleaner for regular or one-off cleaning services.

subcategories.label: Domestic Cleaning
subcategories.description: Cleaning services for homes and apartments.

subcategories.label: Commercial Cleaning
subcategories.description: Cleaning services for offices, shops, and other commercial spaces.

subcategories.label: End of Tenancy Cleaning
subcategories.description: Cleaning services for rental properties at the end of a tenancy.

subcategories.label: Specialist Cleaning
subcategories.description: Specialist cleaning services for specific items or situations.

subcategories.label: Other Cleaning Services
subcategories.description: Other cleaning services not covered by the other subcategories.
